mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.email, m.password FROM member m WHERE m.email = #{ email }
SELECT member_id, email, password, is_deleted, exp, level, planet_name, is_notification_enabled, is_bgm_enabled FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.member_id, m.exp, m.level, m.planet_name, gb.is_selected, b.badge_name FROM member m JOIN get_badge gb ON gb.member_id = m.member_id JOIN badge b ON b.badge_id = gb.badge_id WHERE m.member_id = #{ member_id } AND is_deleted = 'N' AND gb.is_selected = 'Y'
SELECT member_id AS memberId, exp, level FROM member
